name: Editor
description: Read, write, and edit files with line-based operations designed for code editing workflows.

tools.name: Read File
tools.description: Read a file with line numbers. Returns numbered lines formatted as 'line_number\tcontent'. Designed for code editing with 1-indexed line offsets and per-line truncation.

file_path.description: Path to the file to read (absolute, ~, or workspace-relative).

offset.description: 1-indexed line number to start reading from. Defaults to 1.

limit.description: Maximum number of lines to return. Defaults to 2000.

tools.name: Write File
tools.description: Write content to a file, creating it and any parent directories if they don't exist. Overwrites existing files.

file_path.description: Path to the file to write (absolute, ~, or workspace-relative).

content.description: The content to write to the file.

tools.name: Edit File
tools.description: Find and replace text in a file. Supports single or all replacements. Falls back to whitespace-trimmed matching if exact match fails.

file_path.description: Path to the file to edit (absolute, ~, or workspace-relative).

old_string.description: The text to find in the file.

new_string.description: The text to replace it with. Use empty string to delete text.

replace_all.description: If true, replace all occurrences. If false (default), only replace the first and require a unique match.
